import { Card, Divider, Table, Checkbox, Row, Col, Select, Popconfirm } from 'antd' import React, { Component } from 'react' import UserHead from '../../../components/UserHead'; import { createFromIconfontCN } from '@ant-design/icons'; import './OrderTicket.css' const IconFont = createFromIconfontCN({ scriptUrl: '//at.alicdn.com/t/font_2779508_qg92a09n5ub.js', }) const { Option } = Select export default class OrderTicket extends Component { state = { passengers: [ { key: 1, order: 0, level: 1, name: '张三', idCard: '56565', phone: '18222' }, { key: 2, order: 0, level: 1, name: '李四', idCard: '56565', phone: '18222' }, ], dataSource: [ { key: '1', order: 1, level:1, name: '张三', idCard: '510811111111', phone: '182222', }, { key: '2', order: 2, level:2, name: '张三', idCard: '510811111111', phone: '182222', }, ], order: 1 } // 选中乘客 checkPassenger = (checkValus) => { const { passengers, order, dataSource } = this.state const newArr = passengers.filter((passenger) => { if (checkValus.includes(passenger.id)) { passenger.order = order return passenger } }) console.log(newArr) this.setState({ dataSource: [...dataSource, newArr], order: order + 1 }) } deletePassenger = (key) => { const dataSource = [...this.state.dataSource]; console.log(key) this.setState({ dataSource: dataSource.filter(item => item.key !== key) }) } render() { const { dataSource } = this.state const columns = [ { title: '序号', dataIndex: 'order', key: '1', align: 'center', }, { title: '席别', dataIndex: 'level', key: '2', align: 'center', render: () => ( ), }, { title: '姓名', dataIndex: 'name', key: '3', align: 'center', }, { title: '证件号码', key: '4', dataIndex: 'idCard', align: 'center', }, { title: '手机号码', key: '5', dataIndex: 'phone', align: 'center', }, { title: '操作', key: '7', render: (_, record) => this.state.dataSource.length >= 1 ? ( this.deletePassenger(record.key)}> ) : null, align: 'center' }, ]; return (

2021-07-04 G2121 次 成都东 站 （17:35开）——北京 站（19:35到）

豪华（ ￥500 ）6张 普通（ ￥500 ）6张 经济（ ￥500 ）6张

乘车人
张三 李四
) } }
